meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7176 – Caseback Details & Markings
meta_description: Detailed overview of the Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7176 caseback, featuring signed screw-down design, original Porsche Design and Orfina engravings, and vintage PVD coating condition. Insights on serial numbers and authentic markings from the Top Gun era Porsche chronograph.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7176 caseback, Porsche Design screw-down back, vintage PVD watch caseback, Orfina Porsche markings, Lemania 5100 caseback, Chronograph 1 serial numbers, Top Gun watch caseback, 1970s Porsche Design watch
overview: The 7176 series features several caseback variations, each representing different models and prototypes within the reference line.

variations.title: 7176 Mk. 1 Caseback
variations.note: The 7176 and 7176 Military casebacks follow the design language change of the caseback first seen on the 7750 Mk. 2 caseback.

list.title: Perimeter Text:
list.text: “7176 CHRONOGRAPH AUTOMATIC WATERRESISTANT TESTED 10 ATM SHOCKPROTECTED STAINLESS STEEL SWISS MADE” in one continuous circle at the perimeter of the back.

list.title: Center Text:
list.text: The PD logo is accompanied by the words “PORSCHE DESIGN” curved around it above.

list.title: 7176 Civilian:
list.text: Serial range is 8 digits and starts with 00xxxxxx and rises sequentially.

list.title: 7176 Military:
list.text: Serial range is 8 digits and starts with 00xxxxxx and rises sequentially.

variations.title: 7176 D Caseback
variations.note: The 7176 and 7176 Military casebacks follow the design language change of the caseback first seen on the 7750 Mk. 2 caseback.

list.title: 7176 D:
list.text: Serial range is 8 digits and starts with 2031xxxx and rises sequentially.

variations.title: 7176 S Caseback
variations.note: The 7176 and 7176 Military casebacks follow the design language change of the caseback first seen on the 7750 Mk. 2 caseback.

list.title: 7176 S:
list.text: Serial range is 5 or 6 digits with no leading numbers and rises sequentially.

variations.title: Prototype Caseback
variations.note: On select 7176 variants, usually those identified as prototypes, a different caseback has been identified. It features a black acrylic disk that is embedded into the steel caseback.

list.title: Perimeter Text:
list.text: “7176 S CHRONOGRAPH AUTOMATIC WATERRESISTANT TESTED 10 ATM SHOCKPROTECTED STAINLESS STEEL SWISS MADE” in one continuous circle at the perimeter of the back.

list.title: Center Text:
list.text: A sizeable PD logo is accompanied by the words “PORSCHE DESIGN” curved around it above
